briefTitle: Three Dimensional (3D) Ultrasound in Predicting Response to Breast Cancer Therapies
officialTitle: 3D Breast Ultrasound In Predicting Response to Breast Cancer Therapies
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Volume change on spatially registered (aligned) images tracks path. response better than volume change on unregistered images.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Newly diagnosed breast cancer prior to receiving breast cancer therapy.
* Diagnosis of breast cancer must be confirmed by fine needle aspiration or core biopsy.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Poorly controlled diabetes.
* Contralateral mastectomy prior to neoadjuvant chemotherapy.
* Not a surgical candidate.
* No previous axillary lymph node dissection.
